text: Langdon is a city in Cavalier County in the state of North Dakota, United States. It is the county seat of Cavalier County. The population was 1,909 at the 2020 census. Langdon was made the county seat in 1884. It was incorporated in 1885. == References == Category:1884 establishments in Dakota Territory Category:Cities in North Dakota Category:County seats in North Dakota
title: Langdon, North Dakota
